name: Astuce Apex-Legends
description:
Apex-Legends tips & quiz is new app for battle royale Fans!

Compete against other big apex lovers in this amazing guide and quiz app with always update questions for Apex-Legends Battle Royale!

Features:
* Guide - necessary informations - include Weapons and skins informations
* Challenge mode
* Classic arcade mode Quiz
* and much more Fun

Do you have your own questions you'd like to submit for our next update? Send them to us (thelittlecloud.dev@gmail.com)

Lets see if you are worthy to become the true master of the nNew Apex-Legends ! Let the battle begin!!!

Note:
This is not apex generator & cheats. All this kind of apps are scam. this is just guide&quiz app fanmade for fans

Disclamer:
This app is not affiliated with or endorsed by Apex-Legends Respawn Entertainment, Titanfall or any partners. All credit goes to the Apex-Legends. It is designed as a reference app. Usage for this educational guide falls within fair use guidelines.
